BlackBox.name: Clash.Explicit.ROM.File.romFile#
BlackBox.type:
romFile# :: ( KnownNat m             --       ARG[0]
             , KnownDomain dom conf )--       ARG[1]
          => Clock dom                -- clk,  ARG[2]
          -> Enable dom               -- en,   ARG[3]
          -> SNat n                   -- sz,   ARG[4]
          -> FilePath                 -- file, ARG[5]
          -> Signal dom Int           -- rd,   ARG[6]
          -> Signal dom (BitVector m)
